headline: Fall in Love with Lower Prices at Kroger
summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR) today shared it is helping customers save at checkout and at the pump. Offering discounts on items that matter most, including beef, eggs and produce, the retailer is serving up savings that make a difference. Kroger is also offering a Fall Fuel weekend event, offering 4X bonus Fuel Points November 7-9. Customers can earn fuel points in October and November to save on upcoming holiday travel.

headline: Synergy CHC (NASDAQ: SNYR) Deepens FOCUSfactor® Expansion with Kroger, PriceSmart & Wakefern — Strengthening U.S., Canada, and Global Reach
summary: WESTBROOK, Maine, Oct. 22, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Synergy CHC Corp. (NASDAQ: SNYR), a leading consumer health and wellness company, today announced a series of major retail authorizations and distribution partnerships across the United States, Canada, and international markets. headline: Kroger (KR): Assessing Valuation After Recent Share Price Fluctuations
summary: Kroger (KR) shares have seen mixed movement over the past week, and there isn’t a single headline driving recent price action. Instead, investors are weighing the company’s performance numbers and longer-term returns against current valuation. See our latest analysis for Kroger. Kroger’s 2024 share price has shown some spring and stumbles, with recent declines offsetting earlier gains. The bigger story is the impressive 22% total shareholder return delivered over the last 12 months and a...
